annonstext:
Curb is ambitiously creating high quality food experiences fully tailored for home delivery. We offer different food choices - all delivered to your doorstep at the same time. We don't compromise, so you don't have to either.

We believe in adaptability, high quality and people. We are constantly in motion, adapting to change and that's why our tables have legs. Together we stand in the frontline of changing the restaurant industry with a large passion for food and a twist of tech.

We offer a compelling opportunity to join a quick growing, amazing team with huge ambitions. You will get to work in a versatile, fun workplace with good benefits and the chance to fulfil your potential!

We are now looking for an Expansion Construction Manager for our HQ team in central Stockholm.  You will be the company's Construction and Technical expert that will manage all kitchen openings throughout Europe with a focus on Sweden, Denmark and Central Europe at first. Over time you will develop and set the structure for the Construction and Facility Departments within the Expansion Department of Curb. You will be responsible for setting construction budgets and are measured on the accuracy but also on the number of kitchen openings enabled through your 360 mindset. You  will report to the VP of Expansion.

What you’ll do

- To lead, coordinate and execute the opening of our Curb kitchens and handle the on-site set up.
- Enable an efficient construction site based on drawings from the design team.
-  Manage all activities, starting after signing of a Lease until Expansion hands over the kitchen to the Operation Staff , towards both external stakeholders, such as our general contractors, suppliers, landlords etc., as well as towards all internal stakeholders.
- Create a data driven and efficient way of working that enables rapid growth and handling of many Curb Kitchen openings in different countries at the same time.
- Structure our tendering process and in a restless way seek to improve our cost structures and workflows within the construction and facility department.

What you’ll need

- Experience of Project Management of construction sites in the F&B and/or Retail sector.
- Experience of leading a team formally or informally ideally as Construction Manager.
- Used to work with top management stakeholders and handle many complex tasks and projects at the same time.
- A commercial knowledge that can translate the commercial layer of a drawing to superb solutions on a construction site.
- You are comfortable in and used to take your own initiatives and decisions to keep the fast pace without guidance.
- Strong personal drive and self confidence and a hunger for improvements.
- A curious mind and you are a fast-paced “doer” with a “all is possible” mentality.
- Excellence in both strategy and execution.
